topics.topic_html:
<sn><md class="p-1 p-md-2 my-2" data-rr="true">### **10th BCS**
---

| **No.** | **Question** | **Answer** | **Topic** |
|---------|-------------|-----------|-----------|
| 1 | What is the meaning of 'White Elephant'? | A very costly or troublesome possession | **Vocabulary (Idiom)** |
| 2 | What kind of noun is "girl"? | Common | **Grammar (Parts of Speech)** |
| 3 | What kind of noun is "Cattle"? | Collective | **Grammar (Parts of Speech)** |
| 4 | What is the synonym of "competent"? | Capable | **Vocabulary (Synonyms)** |
| 5 | What is the antonym of "jovial"? | Jealous | **Vocabulary (Antonyms)** |
| 6 | What is the antonym of "Gentle"? | Rude | **Vocabulary (Antonyms)** |
| 7 | I am not bad ___ tennis. | at | **Grammar (Preposition)** |
| 8 | Choose the correct alternative: He ………. to see us if he had been able to do. | would have come | **Grammar (Conditional Tense)** |
| 9 | Choose the appropriate alternative: He had a _______ of fever. | severe attack | **Sentence Correction (Collocation)** |
| 10 | Choose the correct answer: How long did you wait? | Till he came | **Sentence Correction (Conjunction)** |
| 11 | Choose the correct sentence: | The man who said that was a fool | **Sentence Correction (Relative Clause)** |
| 12 | Choose the correct sentence: | Each of three boys got a prize | **Grammar (Subject-Verb Agreement)** |
| 13 | Choose the correct sentence: | I asked Javed if he had passed | **Grammar (Indirect Speech)** |
| 14 | 'Animal Farm' was written by __. | George Orwell | **Literature (Author)** |
| 15 | Who is the author of 'India Wins Freedom'? | Abul Kamal Azad | **Literature (Author)** |
</md></sn>
